case_title: MUZAMMAL HUSSAIN vs MUHAMMAD BOOTA and others

accussed_details.name: Muzammal Hussain
allegation: Delay in seeking redress for ownership rights
Failure to provide new grounds for appeal

complaint_summary: The petitioner challenged the rejection of his appeal by the learned Additional Commissioner (Cons.) regarding ownership rights in land acquired through a civil decree.
investigation_summary: The petitioner acquired ownership rights on 11-4-1982 but delayed applying to be impleaded as a party until 23-2-1986. The lower courts rejected his application due to inordinate delay and lack of new grounds.
judgment_summary: The court dismissed the revision petition, citing the petitioner's delay in seeking redress and the absence of new grounds to overturn concurrent decisions by lower courts.
legal_arguments: Petitioner argued that the Consolidation Scheme unfairly divested both vendor and vendee of legal title without addressing merits.
Respondents argued that the petitioner delayed seeking redress and lacked legal title due to the sale of land by Muhammad Boota.
assets: Land acquired through civil decree on 11-4-1982
key_issues: Delay in seeking redress for ownership rights
Concurrent decisions by lower courts against the petitioner
Legal title of land post-sale by Muhammad Boota

legal_terms.Consolidation Scheme: A legal process under the Consolidation of Holdings Ordinance, 1960, for reorganizing land ownership.
legal_terms.Inordinate Delay: Excessive or unreasonable delay in legal proceedings.

words_and_phrases.Divested: Deprived of legal rights or title.

summary_vector_notes: The case involves a dispute over land ownership rights following a consolidation scheme. The petitioner delayed seeking redress and failed to provide new grounds for appeal, leading to dismissal of the revision petition.

case_summary.key_issue: Delay in filing application to be impleaded as a party and concurrent decisions against the petitioner.

petitioner.contention: The order divested both vendor and vendee of legal title without addressing merits.
petitioner.delay_explanation: No explanation provided for delay between ownership acquisition and application.

respondent.contention: Petitioner guilty of inordinate delay and lacked title due to prior sale by Muhammad Boota.

court_observations.delay: Petitioner delayed from 1982-04-11 to 1986-02-23 without justification.
court_observations.lower_court_decisions: Two concurrent decisions against the petitioner upheld.

final_decision: Petition dismissed due to inordinate delay and lack of new grounds to overturn lower court decisions.
